person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: International trade union leaders on Friday expressed outrage that the head of the International Labour Organisation ( ILO ) had been barred from speaking at next week 's WTO meeting in Singapore .

Let's think step by step.

| Person |
| --- |
| International trade union leaders |
| the head of the International Labour Organisation (ILO) |

Note: I'm not sure if "the head of the International Labour Organisation (ILO)" refers to a specific individual or if it's a title for the position. In either case, I have included it as a Person entity in the table.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
| --- |
| International trade union leaders |
| the head of the International Labour Organisation (ILO) |

Note: I have reviewed the paragraph again, and I still believe that both "International trade union leaders" and "the head of the International Labour Organisation (ILO)" refer to specific groups or individuals, and I have included them as Person entities in the table.

location.content:
Please identify the "Location" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Location". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: International trade union leaders on Friday expressed outrage that the head of the International Labour Organisation ( ILO ) had been barred from speaking at next week 's WTO meeting in Singapore .

Let's think step by step.

| Location   |
|------------|
| Singapore  |

Explanation:
The location entity in the paragraph is "Singapore", which is mentioned as the place where the WTO meeting is going to take place.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Location" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Location".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Location   |
|------------|
| Singapore  |

Explanation:
The only location entity in the paragraph is "Singapore", which is clearly referring to a specific location where the WTO meeting is scheduled to take place. The other entities like "International trade union leaders", "head of the International Labour Organisation (ILO)", and "WTO" do not refer to a location and hence have not been included in the table.

organization.content:
Please identify the "Organization" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Organization". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: International trade union leaders on Friday expressed outrage that the head of the International Labour Organisation ( ILO ) had been barred from speaking at next week 's WTO meeting in Singapore .

Let's think step by step.

| Organization |
| --- |
| International trade union leaders |
| International Labour Organisation (ILO) |
| WTO |

Explanation:

1. International trade union leaders: This is a group of leaders from various trade unions around the world, and while it is not a single organization, I have included it as it is referred to as a collective entity in the paragraph.
2. International Labour Organisation (ILO): This is a United Nations agency dealing with labour issues, promoting rights at work, encouraging decent employment opportunities, enhancing social protection, and strengthening dialogue on work-related issues.
3. WTO: The World Trade Organization is an intergovernmental organization that regulates international trade.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Organization" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Organization".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Organization |
| --- |
| International Labour Organisation (ILO) |
| WTO |

Explanation:

1. International Labour Organisation (ILO): This is a United Nations agency dealing with labour issues, promoting rights at work, encouraging decent employment opportunities, enhancing social protection, and strengthening dialogue on work-related issues.
2. WTO: The World Trade Organization is an intergovernmental organization that regulates international trade.

I have removed "International trade union leaders" as it is not a single organization but a group of leaders from various trade unions.
